      • addTicket

        public static Ticket addTicket(double playerNums)
        Asks the user to input there name, address, phone number, and there lotto numbers While Loop to check if the player has entered a unique number If the user has entered a number they have already used they will be asked to enter a new number
        Parameters:
        playerNums - Creates the players lotto number inputted from the keyboard
        Returns:
        Returns a ticket that the user generates through the keyboard ( player name, player phone number, and the players lotto numbers)

      • printToTxt

        public void printToTxt()
        creates new text file called "TICKETS" iterates through array list stores array list data in text file
